```javascript
// Phase C.1 - Syst√®me de v√©rification avec retry progressif
export const verifyAndDisplaySeries = async (seriesName, targetCategory, userSeriesLibrary, loadUserSeriesLibrary) => {
  const maxAttempts = 3;
  const baseDelayMs = 500;
  
  for (let attempt = 1; attempt <= maxAttempts; attempt++) {
    // Charger s√©ries fra√Æches + v√©rification stricte
    const seriesFound = userSeriesLibrary.some(series => 
      series.series_name?.toLowerCase().trim() === seriesName.toLowerCase().trim() && 
      series.category === targetCategory
    );
    
    if (seriesFound) {
      // D√©clencher retour biblioth√®que avec succ√®s
      window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('backToLibrary', { detail: ... }));
      return { success: true, attempts, totalTime };
    }
    
    // D√©lai progressif avant retry
    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, baseDelayMs * attempt));
  }
};
```

‚úÖ **GESTIONNAIRE √âV√âNEMENT RETOUR AUTOMATIQUE** (`App.js`) :

```javascript
    if (reason === 'series_verified_success') {
```

```javascript
const groupBooksByStatus = (books) => {
  if (searchHook.isSearchMode) {
    // En mode recherche, pas de groupement par statut
    return { all: books };
  }

  const groups = {
    reading: [],    // EN COURS
    to_read: [],    // √Ä LIRE  
    completed: [],  // TERMIN√â
    series: []      // S√âRIES (toujours au d√©but)
  };

  books.forEach(book => {
    if (book.isSeriesCard) {
      groups.series.push(book);
    } else {
      const status = book.status || 'to_read';
      if (groups[status]) {
        groups[status].push(book);
      } else {
        groups.to_read.push(book); // Statut inconnu ‚Üí √Ä lire par d√©faut
      }
    }
  });

  return groups;
};
```

#### Phase 2 : Impl√©mentation Solution C

‚úÖ **Fonction `verifyAndDisplayBook` Cr√©√©e** :
```javascript
/**
 * ‚úÖ SOLUTION ROBUSTE AVEC RETRY INTELLIGENT - OPTION C
 * V√©rification intelligente et affichage livre ajout√© avec retry adaptatif
 * Race condition MongoDB r√©solue d√©finitivement
 */
const verifyAndDisplayBook = async (bookTitle, targetCategory, books, loadBooks, loadStats) => {
  const maxAttempts = 3;
  const baseDelayMs = 500;
  const timeoutMs = 5000; // Timeout global 5s
  
  console.log(`üîç [OPTION C] V√©rification livre: "${bookTitle}" en cat√©gorie "${targetCategory}"`);
  
  const startTime = Date.now();
  
  for (let attempt = 1; attempt <= maxAttempts; attempt++) {
    try {
      console.log(`üìö [OPTION C] Tentative ${attempt}/${maxAttempts} - Chargement donn√©es...`);
      
      // Charger donn√©es fra√Æches
      await Promise.all([loadBooks(), loadStats()]);
      
      // V√©rifier pr√©sence livre avec crit√®res stricts
      const bookFound = books.some(book => 
        book.title?.toLowerCase().trim() === bookTitle.toLowerCase().trim() && 
        book.category === targetCategory
      );
      
      if (bookFound) {
        const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
        console.log(`‚úÖ [OPTION C] Livre trouv√© apr√®s ${attempt} tentative(s) en ${totalTime}ms`);
        
        // D√©clencher retour biblioth√®que avec succ√®s
        const backToLibraryEvent = new CustomEvent('backToLibrary', {
          detail: { 
            reason: 'book_verified_success',
            bookTitle,
            targetCategory,
            attempts: attempt,
            totalTime
          }
        });
        window.dispatchEvent(backToLibraryEvent);
        
        return { success: true, attempts: attempt, totalTime };
      }
      
      // D√©lai progressif avant retry (500ms, 1000ms, 1500ms)
      if (attempt < maxAttempts) {
        const delayMs = baseDelayMs * attempt;
        console.log(`‚è≥ [OPTION C] Livre non trouv√©, retry dans ${delayMs}ms...`);
        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delayMs));
      }
      
      // V√©rification timeout global
      if (Date.now() - startTime > timeoutMs) {
        console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è [OPTION C] Timeout global atteint, abandon verification');
        break;
      }
      
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`‚ùå [OPTION C] Tentative ${attempt} √©chou√©e:`, error);
      
      // En cas d'erreur, d√©lai plus court avant retry
      if (attempt < maxAttempts) {
        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 300));
      }
    }
  }
  
  // √âchec apr√®s toutes les tentatives
  const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
  console.error(`‚ùå [OPTION C] Livre non trouv√© apr√®s ${maxAttempts} tentatives en ${totalTime}ms`);
  
  // Fallback UX : notification avec action manuelle
  toast.error(
    `Livre "${bookTitle}" ajout√© avec succ√®s mais non visible. Actualisez la page ou v√©rifiez l'onglet ${targetCategory}.`,
    {
      duration: 8000,
      action: {
        label: 'Actualiser',
        onClick: () => window.location.reload()
      }
    }
  );
  
  return { success: false, attempts: maxAttempts, totalTime };
};
```

```javascript
/**
 * V√©rification intelligente et affichage livre ajout√©
 * Retry adaptatif avec d√©lai progressif pour synchronisation MongoDB

const verifyAndDisplayBook = async (bookTitle, targetCategory, loadBooks, loadStats) => {
  const maxAttempts = 3;
  const baseDelayMs = 500;
  const timeoutMs = 5000; // Timeout global 5s
  
  console.log(`üîç V√©rification livre: "${bookTitle}" en cat√©gorie "${targetCategory}"`);
  
  const startTime = Date.now();
  
  for (let attempt = 1; attempt <= maxAttempts; attempt++) {
    try {
      console.log(`üìö Tentative ${attempt}/${maxAttempts} - Chargement donn√©es...`);
      
      // Charger donn√©es fra√Æches
      await Promise.all([loadBooks(), loadStats()]);
      
      // V√©rifier pr√©sence livre avec crit√®res stricts
      const bookFound = books.some(book => 
        book.title?.toLowerCase().trim() === bookTitle.toLowerCase().trim() && 
        book.category === targetCategory
      );
      
      if (bookFound) {
        const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
        console.log(`‚úÖ Livre trouv√© apr√®s ${attempt} tentative(s) en ${totalTime}ms`);
        
        // D√©clencher retour biblioth√®que avec succ√®s
        const backToLibraryEvent = new CustomEvent('backToLibrary', {
          detail: { 
            reason: 'book_verified_success',
            bookTitle,
            targetCategory,
            attempts: attempt,
            totalTime
          }
        });
        window.dispatchEvent(backToLibraryEvent);
        
        return { success: true, attempts: attempt, totalTime };
      }
      
      // D√©lai progressif avant retry (500ms, 1000ms, 1500ms)
      if (attempt < maxAttempts) {
        const delayMs = baseDelayMs * attempt;
        console.log(`‚è≥ Livre non trouv√©, retry dans ${delayMs}ms...`);
        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delayMs));
      }
      
      // V√©rification timeout global
      if (Date.now() - startTime > timeoutMs) {
        console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è Timeout global atteint, abandon verification');
        break;
      }
      
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`‚ùå Tentative ${attempt} √©chou√©e:`, error);
      
      // En cas d'erreur, d√©lai plus court avant retry
      if (attempt < maxAttempts) {
        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 300));
      }
    }
  }
  
  // √âchec apr√®s toutes les tentatives
  const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
  console.error(`‚ùå Livre non trouv√© apr√®s ${maxAttempts} tentatives en ${totalTime}ms`);
  
  // Fallback UX : notification avec action manuelle
  toast.error(
    `Livre "${bookTitle}" ajout√© avec succ√®s mais non visible. Actualisez la page ou v√©rifiez l'onglet ${targetCategory}.`,
    {
      duration: 8000,
      action: {
        label: 'Actualiser',
        onClick: () => window.location.reload()
      }
    }
  );
  
  return { success: false, attempts: maxAttempts, totalTime };
};
```

```javascript
// Fonction de correspondance floue
function fuzzyMatch(searchTerm, seriesName) {
  // Normalisation (accents, casse)
  const normalizeText = (text) => text.toLowerCase()
    .normalize("NFD").replace(/[\u0300-\u036f]/g, "");
  
  const normalizedSearch = normalizeText(searchTerm);
  const normalizedSeries = normalizeText(seriesName);
  
  // Distance de Levenshtein
  const distance = levenshteinDistance(normalizedSearch, normalizedSeries);
  const maxLength = Math.max(normalizedSearch.length, normalizedSeries.length);
  
  // Score de similarit√© (0-100%)
  return ((maxLength - distance) / maxLength) * 100;
}

// Base de donn√©es s√©ries officielles
function getOfficialSeries() {
  // Retourne r√©f√©rentiel bas√© Wikipedia
  return SERIES_OFFICIELLES;
}

// Validation tome officiel
function isOfficialTome(bookTitle, seriesName, author) {
  const series = getOfficialSeries()[seriesName.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '_')];
  if (!series) return false;
  
  // V√©rifier auteur officiel
  const isOfficialAuthor = series.auteurs.some(officialAuthor => 
    author.toLowerCase().includes(officialAuthor.toLowerCase())
  );
  
  // V√©rifier titre dans liste officielle
  const isOfficialTitle = series.tomes_officiels.some(officialTitle =>
    fuzzyMatch(bookTitle, officialTitle) > 80
  );
  
  return isOfficialAuthor && isOfficialTitle;
}
```

```javascript
};
```
